comments.comments_text: A yellow card for a tackle by Luisao (Benfica). Felix Zwayer doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A yellow card for a tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). [REFEREE] doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

comments.comments_text: Pizzi (Benfica) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.

comments.comments_text: Pizzi (Benfica) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Manchester Utd.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.

comments.comments_text: Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: Felix Zwayer shows the yellow card to Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) for a heavy challenge. Benfica get a free kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows the yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for a heavy challenge. [TEAM] get a free kick.

comments.comments_text: Diogo Goncalves (Benfica) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Felix Zwayer ignores the protests.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but [REFEREE] ignores the protests.

comments.comments_text: It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Pizzi as he is replaced by Andrija Zivkovic (Benfica).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from [PLAYER] as he is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted. The ball goes out of play and Manchester Utd have been awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted. The ball goes out of play and [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) fires the ball from the free kick with a knuckleball of a shot from distance, the ball changes direction in the air and forces the goalkeeper into making a complete howler!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) fires the ball from the free kick with a knuckleball of a shot from distance, the ball changes direction in the air and forces the goalkeeper into making a complete howler!

comments.comments_text: Rui Vitoria decides to make a substitution. Diogo Goncalves will be replaced by Jonas (Benfica).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] decides to make a substitution. [PLAYER] will be replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford is substituted due to injury. Jose Mourinho gives a chance to Anthony Martial (Manchester United).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] is substituted due to injury. [PLAYER] gives a chance to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester Utd will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. [TEAM] will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: Ljubomir Fejsa (Benfica) receives a good pass and from just outside the box he unleashes a promising strike, but the shot is blocked by the defender. Benfica have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Henrikh Mkhitaryan departs the field of play to be replaced by Scott McTominay (Manchester United).

comments.comments_text: Luisao (Benfica) must have known he would be sent off for this foul, but he had to stop the opponent at all costs. Felix Zwayer shows him a second yellow card and the game has ended for him.
